item.description:
Let's close out the summer with a good old fashioned clambake.  We'll meet a Four Tree Island, a little park just off Pierce Island and connected with a causeway.  We'll meet at 2PM and start cooking, bring a frisbee or some other way to pass the time as the food cooks.

     This will be a BYOLC (bring your own lobster and clams) affair with a $5 cover.  You provide your own lobster and clams, I'll provide the rest, cooking tools, plates, utensils, soft drinks, butter, corn on the cob ( if it's still in season) etc.

    For simplicities sake I recommend everyone bring 1 pound lobsters, this will avoid confusion, if a 1 pound lobster isn't enough, bring a second!

    So come join us on 9/10/11 and say goodbye to summer the old fashioned New England way with a clambake.
item.how_to_find_us: I was unable to secure the center gazebo so look for where I have the cooking equipment setup. It isn't a large island so we should be easy to find.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: End of the Summer Clambake
